titleStmt.title: Several essays relating to accademies, banks, bankrupts, charity-lotteries, courts of enquiries, court merchants, friendly-societies, high-ways, pension-office, seamen, wagering, &c. now communicated to the world for publick good.
titleStmt.author: Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Daniel Defoe. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
